phrases: I will invite Kariu to the fireworks festival...
Oga said he might go to college elsewhere.
And here I was taking it for granted that we would be together in college, too.
But if we end up separated, I will regret not saying anything.
So help make sure we are alone together!
If you know you will be separated...
There is nothing worse a person can do than be late!
This failure can never be forgiven.
Nobody would ever say that to someone three minutes late.
I have never been to a festival.
Let us catch some goldfish again!
But the crowd's a bit much, and I am a little dizzy.
Then I will accept your offer.
Look, we need to be subtle.
Got To leave those two alone naturally
Is Yoake-san really making a move on a high school girl?!
No, no, out of the question.
Sure, I asked for it, but this came out of nowhere!
Hurry up, or I will catch them all.
If gravitation force is g, and my throw is at 180 degrees,
More importantly, do something about An!
Hmm... it would be a problem if we had a subject
and an employee hanging out, ignoring the students.
But everyone is here today, so it is fine!
You are not bothered by Onoya.
You do not like me being with Hishiro-san.
Sorry, I did not even notice.
It is the last summer of high school.
It is a precious time that will not come again.
this is your first and last summer!
So what am I supposed to do about it?
But that is not the point...
Nobody told me this would happen!
I did not think he would do that!
I did not think you would do this!
That is the same thing, is not it?
I did not mean it like that.
Man, I came up with so many ideas.
It was not supposed to go like this!
When you asked me to these fireworks, I was so happy.
I remembered you talking about going to college elsewhere.
So I made up my mind to tell you today.
I have been in love with you since our first year, too.
Will you go out with me?
I summon all my courage to tell you, and that is how you react?!
I mean, who would not be surprised?
I was going to ask you out, but you asked me instead!
I have never really talked about these things with friends.
I think I am not good at picking up on things.
I had no idea you felt that way.
I did not notice how I felt, either.
Not until Arata gave me a push.
I thought that without you, everything would be so boring.
The idea of someone else touching you... was just not okay.
Do not get embarrassed on a delay!
Oh... but the fireworks are starting!
But I guess for you, this is your first and last summer!
Man, we are really boxed in here.
Please enjoy the beautiful fireworks against the clear summer sky.
Hishiro-san, want to just watch from here?
Is he a friend of yours, Kaizaki-san?
I have seen you talk at school, too.
Kaizaki-san, you make friends with everybody very easily.
In April, you would just enrolled,
but you were already surrounded by friends.
I remember seeing that and clearly thinking,
I have got to try harder.
Hishiro-san, you are here with everyone, too.
You are surrounded by friends, too, Hishiro-san.
I am really glad I met you.
But I am so focused on my left hand, I can barely watch the fireworks!
But I am so focused on my right hand, I can barely watch the fireworks!
I am really glad I met you.
What did she mean by that?
No, no, she meant nothing more.
If she felt like it, Hishiro-san would totally say that to anyone!
For thinking of me that way.
But there is something a little sad about them, too.
They are so flashy, pretty, and exciting, but as they fade, you feel sort of lonely.
You are an illusion that is meant to fade away.
They are so flashy, pretty, and exciting, but as they fade, you feel sort of lonely.
Hishiro-san, you are here with everyone.
I am glad I met you.
If you know you will be separated... it kind of seems pointless.
Ryo was in my class last year.
He told me to call him that.
It is not often that you start a conversation.
Kariu-san and Tamarai-san gave them to me.
It is not often that you start a conversation.
It is all thanks to you, Hishiro!
Do not give up like I did.
You have been selected as the ReLIFE Laboratory Kanto Branch's
Nice to meet you, Hishiro Chizuru-san.
classmates, teachers, and anyone you dealt with will forget about you.
The more fun I have, the more it will hurt when we part ways.
I know that all too well.
I know this is a bad idea.
Kaizaki-san, you are like the fireworks.
Okay, I will walk Onoya-san home!
You live in the same direction, right?
You do not like me being with Hishiro-san.
I just never see them together.
It was surprising, that is all.
The crowd got to me again.
Let us rest here a while.
I am really glad for Kariu-san.
The truth is, Kariu-san was also going to ask Kazu-kun out today.
Because Kazu-kun might be going to a different college.
She said if that happened, she would regret not saying anything.
I thought that falling in love when you knew you would have to part
But when I saw them together, I was happy for them from the bottom of my heart.
Maybe worrying about future partings so much
that you miss out on happiness in the present is a waste.
Everyone you dealt with will forget about you.
But we are living in the moment.
and enjoy every moment to the fullest.
All I can do is cheer her on.
She will forget all about me.
If all her memories are about me,
then she will have no memories of this year left.
I cannot rob her of the life she is fighting so hard to have.
I was just wondering if there is anyone you like.
You do not want anyone taking her away.
You just find it cute that a high schooler's awkwardly but earnestly trying to change, right?
Like watching a kid sister grow up?
I did not imagine I would trip.
I am glad I caught you.
then let me take your arm.
Someday we will have to part.
I will not ever forget you.
I will not forget you, either.
Even though Senpai showed you how to link arms!
Wait, that was your idea, though.
Anyway, I have got a good report to write today.
Kaizaki-san's the man I thought he was!
He managed to get Kariu-san and Oga-kun together.
If she is with Kaizaki-san, Hishiro-san, too...
Well, that is up to you.
Since you will be taking over as her support next term!
Kaizaki Arata causes change in those around him.
This is a direct result of his own actions,
his drive to get involved with the people near him.
That, more than anything, proves his ReLIFE is going well.
I used the camera for the first time.
Fireworks may vanish, but memories remain.
What am I, some sort of demon?!
I will not lose this time!
Is that what this looks like?!
A one-year, limited edition of youth.
I may be an illusion that will be forgotten...
